articles.title: 'American Idol': Ava Maybee has music in her DNA with Chad Smith of Red Hot Chili Peppers as dad - KABC-TV
articles.description: American Idol contestant Ava Maybee has support from her dad Chad Smith of Red Hot Chili Peppers but says "I'm here to do it on my own."

articles.title: Doctors suggest new names for low-grade prostate cancer | Loop Cayman Islands - Loop News Cayman
articles.description:
A cancer diagnosis is scary. Some doctors say it's time to rename low-grade prostate cancer to eliminate the alarming C-word.

articles.title: Earth's message to space 'more ceremonial than anything' - NT News
articles.description:
